verses.roman:
nija-ghare lañā kaila pāda-prakṣālana
sei jala lañā kaila sa-vaṁśe bhakṣaṇa

synonyms: nija-ghare—to his own home; lañā—bringing; kaila—did; pāda-prakṣālana—washing of the feet; sei jala—that water; lañā—taking; kaila—did; sa-vaṁśe—with all the family members; bhakṣaṇa—drinking.
translation: Śrī Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa took Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to his home. After he washed the Lord's feet, all the members of his family drank the water.
